title: Morning, Monessen, Pennsylvania
marks: Signature, Title, Date and Stamp on back at bottom edge, in black ink: [Jerome Lieb
description: old woman seen from back, wearing white coat, socks and shoes, and a red plaid headscarf, on a deserted street with empty storefront at left; two parking meters; old sign, upper left corner
creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
